text: Nelsan Ellis (November 30, 1977 â€“ July 8, 2017) was an American actor and playwright. He was best known for his role as Lafayette Reynolds in the HBO series True Blood from 2008 to 2014. He also appeared in the movies The Butler (2013) and Get on Up (2014). Ellis was born in Harvey, Illinois. He joined the United States Marines at the age of 17. Ellis died of heart failure caused by alcohol withdrawal on July 8, 2017 in Brooklyn, New York. He was 39. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Illinois Category:African-American movie actors Category:African-American television actors Category:American playwrights Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Writers from Illinois
title: Nelsan Ellis
